data.text: O! Yehowa, madzi ha le wò lɔlɔ̃
Makpɔ nyuie be menɔ agbe si ŋu mokaka mele o,
Nyematsɔ nu si me vɔ̃ le la aɖo nye ŋkume o.
Ame siwo ƒe dzi to vo la, ate ɖa xaa tso gbɔnye,
Made ga nu na ame si ƒo ɖi ehavi ƒe ŋkɔ le bebeme,
Ame si nye ameblela la, manɔ aƒenye me o,
Ŋdi sia ŋdi la, mana ame vɔ̃ɖi siwo
